I recommend Royal Panda, a Chinese restaurant in Paris. It has a rating of 4.2 and is open on Mondays from 11 am to 10 pm. The price per person is 25 euros, and it has reviews praising its authentic Chinese cuisine, friendly and attentive staff, and cozy and inviting atmosphere. The address is: 

Royal Panda, Paris
